content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (61.0, -52.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 61.0, -52.0) with an inventory that includes coal and iron ore.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient inventory
- Ensure you have enough coal in your inventory before inserting it into the furnace. The furnace requires a minimum of 5 coal to operate.
- Verify that you have enough raw materials (iron ore) to insert into the furnace to avoid smelting timeouts.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Make sure to be within reach of the resource you want to harvest. If nothing is within reach, you will not be able to harvest it.

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Check the furnace inventory before inserting items to ensure it has enough capacity and that you have the required fuel and inputs.
